Package dev.ua.theroer.magicutils.logger

Class LoggerExamples

java.lang.Object
dev.ua.theroer.magicutils.logger.LoggerExamples
public class LoggerExamples extends Object
Examples of using the new unified logger system. This class demonstrates all the new logging approaches after the refactoring.
